oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Street Scene, Sixth Avenue North at Union Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This nighttime scene of Sixth Avenue North highlights Davitt's men's clothing, The Hermitage Hotel Marquee, which announces Glenn Bainbridge's run for Mayor, and the Knickerbocker Theater Marquee in the background. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hermitage Hotel; Knickerbocker Theater
Capital City; Architecture; Buildings; Popular culture; Shopping; Business; Tourism; Performing Arts; Theatre
Nashville (Tenn.); Sixth Avenue North
